participant_1.background:
I spend time with my dogs, which helps me feel better.
I'd brag about using my fame to advocate for animal welfare and conservation.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!
last month the farm was foreclosed so i am looking for a new job.
I wake up, eat breakfast, and practice my cooking before work.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
I'm a 25-year-old female who loves the Fourth of July because the fireworks are so beautiful, but I'm scared of left turns.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
i commute by bus.

content.text: Hi! Do you have any interesting hobbies?
Hi, yes I do! I love to take my classic car on drives!
Oh, that sounds fun! I've always wanted to learn how to drive stick.
You should! It's so much fun! I also love to cook. What about you?
I love to cook too! I love to practice new recipes and try new things.
That's great! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes! I'm really good at making homemade pasta.
That sounds delicious! I love pasta too.
Maybe we should cook together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to learn how to make homemade pasta.
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans.
